guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.
guild.description_html:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.
guild.name: AskRuqqus

parent.body:
I agree and especially like Ruqqus for that reason despite the hivemind tendencies. 
Quite sad though that hiveminds would form like that in the first place, I fear it'll just become like Reddit (if it survives long enough) in terms of how bad the hivemind is if it becomes really big.

Quite sad though that hiveminds would form like that in the first place, I fear it'll just become like Reddit (if it survives long enough) in terms of how bad the hivemind is if it becomes really big.

post.body:
I believe just like reddit, voat, and other sites, ruqqus is just (on the political side) a hivemind by this point.
Is it as bad as reddit? Probably not, however I'd say it's not good either.
I still like ruqqus but I just don't feel like it's as good when it was a smaller community than it was now, as opinions weren't entirely shut down from the get go like with reddit and voat.

Footnote: This is an opinion, not fact.

parent.body: I disagree with your perception. Reddit has been banning conservatives for being conservatives and holding conservative opinions. Ruqqus users are currently mostly conservatives but that just happens to be so, it's not a hivemind like in other places. Anyone can have their opinions and debate them here. Try that in other places and soon you will find yourself banned because those hiveminds don't tolerate diversity of opinion.

body:
Your account should still be deleted, but like on reddit it probably shows the suspended page before the deleted one.

As for not being able to see your own post history that's a bug which I fixed several weeks ago but captainmeta4 only cares about code from his discord buddies so he has yet to apply it.

I can't believe how immature captainmeta4 is acting in that screenshot, he's at Trump levels of narcissism or possibly even worse. No wonder he abuses his power.

I can't believe how immature captainmeta4 is acting in that screenshot, he's at Trump levels of narcissism or possibly even worse. No wonder he abuses his power.

body:
I think it is deleted, I'm assuming the user page is checking if the account is banned before checking for deletion. You *used* to not be able to delete a suspended account due to a bug, [but it was fixed recently](https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/pull/589/files#diff-3909581a33b19307746062eaad4e836b97d9ce160fd01e6af2fea5c29bd7e105L379).

However the bug where you can't see your own profile remains.

Edit: the bug is back for some reason, along with another one where you can't delete your account without ruqqus premium.
body_html:
I think it is deleted, I'm assuming the user page is checking if the account is banned before checking for deletion. You used to not be able to delete a suspended account due to a bug, but it was fixed recently.

However the bug where you can't see your own profile remains.

Edit: the bug is back for some reason, along with another one where you can't delete your account without ruqqus premium.

body: Nope, check outside at noon and it's bright neon white. Can't even see the disc anymore (that part was always white). This often occurs even at sunset now. And have you noticed the coloring of daytime looking desolate and washed out as hell? It's way too bright and there's no longer a warm inviting tint of yellow. And the heat feels acute and scalding rather than just a dull hot. And rather than a source of life it makes the world feel like a nuclear fallout zone.
body_html: Nope, check outside at noon and it's bright neon white. Can't even see the disc anymore (that part was always white). This often occurs even at sunset now. And have you noticed the coloring of daytime looking desolate and washed out as hell? It's way too bright and there's no longer a warm inviting tint of yellow. And the heat feels acute and scalding rather than just a dull hot. And rather than a source of life it makes the world feel like a nuclear fallout zone.

body: The original would be the best as I have yet to find a translation that isn't biased and doesn't either make use of ultra complicated religious language or paraphrase it (the words used in the original text were casual and everyday terms, even "Christ" (ΧΡΙΣΤΟΣ) was not a cryptic transliteration but greek for savior, and it was translated from the hebrew word משיח). Unfortunately the pure original no longer exists as we don't have the autographs. I suggest you start with the gospels which contain just about everything you need to know, and then read the other stuff if you want and the questionable parts will probably feel off.
body_html: The original would be the best as I have yet to find a translation that isn't biased and doesn't either make use of ultra complicated religious language or paraphrase it (the words used in the original text were casual and everyday terms, even "Christ" (ΧΡΙΣΤΟΣ) was not a cryptic transliteration but greek for savior, and it was translated from the hebrew word משיח). Unfortunately the pure original no longer exists as we don't have the autographs. I suggest you start with the gospels which contain just about everything you need to know, and then read the other stuff if you want and the questionable parts will probably feel off.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

post.meta_title: Andrew Torba ✝️ on Gab: '' - Gab Social
post.title: Andrew Torba: In order to build something “back better” it must be built on a better foundation than before. The globalists want to rebuild on a weak foundation of sand: critical theory, racial conflict, crony capitalism, political corruption, godless nihilist consumerism, etc. We need to build back on the foundation of Christ, family values, life, and fellowship. That’s how we will build back much better than ever before as we watch their foundation of sand collapse on itself.

body: Because they're using it as a political tool more than anything else. "Here, we picked out and probably twisted a verse in the bible to say X, so we should do X". I don't think they even really believe it. They only focus on about 10 short quotes that seem to support their political agenda out of context and quietly discard everything else.
